Package pizza.message

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfirmationItem
    Represents one line item on an order confirmation, including a description of the item and its price
    ConfirmationItemTest
    Tests that a ConfirmationItem object correctly contains and returns data
    ConfirmationMessage
    Itemized total bill for a pizza order, including a description and price of each item in the order plus sales tax and total
    ConfirmationMessageTest
    Tests the ConfirmationMessag sent by a PizzaServer
    MenuItem
    Represents a menu item on a pizza restaurant menu.
    MenuMessage
    Represents a menu for a pizza restaurant.
    MenuRequestMessage
    This Message type contains no data, but simply requests a message
    OrderItem
    Represents an item in a PizzaOrder sent from a PizzaClient to a PizzaServer
    OrderMessage
    Represents a pizza order transmitted from a PizzaClient to a PizzaServer, containing one or more specialty pies and slices with toppings.
    PizzaMessage
    Base class for all of the message types exchanged during operations of the Pizza Protocol.
    SliceMenuItem
    Represents a slice on a pizza menu.
    SliceOrderItem
    Represents a slice together with zero or more toppings.
    SpecialtyPizzaMenuItem
    Represents a specialty pizza item on a restaurant menu
    SpecialtyPizzaOrderItem
    Represents an order item for one or more specialty pizzas of a specified size SMALL, MEDIUM, or LARGE.
    Topping
    Represents a topping that can be ordered for a pizza slice.
